# The `validate_format_parameters` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

These are templated helper classes used by the format function that capture the object to be formatted and the format string. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename... Args&gt;
struct llvm::validate_format_parameters&lt;Args&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

These are templated helper classes used by the format function that capture the object to be formatted and the format string.

When actually printed, this synthesizes the string into a temporary buffer provided and returns whether or not it is big enough.

Definition at line 81 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/format-h">Format.h</a>.
